I just don't understand all this, I started using Wen like 5 maybe 6 months ago, I have no problem with it :/, There is no more hair coming out of my head when I brush it now, than there was before I started using Wen, to be honest I can say there is actually less hair coming out with each brushing. and NO I'm not getting paid to say all this, cause trust me, I love my damn hair and if this s hit right here was happening to me, I'd be all over that man with my steel toed boots !! I'm sorry all y'all ladies are losing your hair, but isn't it possible that y'all are allergic to something in the product . That's a damn shame, I hope you all are compensated, real talk, n o woman should have to go through that type of hair loss unless it's from Chemo, at least that'd be a more legitimate reason to be losing your hair in such alarming quanities :(
